title: Road Users Detection
description: Recognize if there are people, trains, cars, busses, bicycles, motorbikes in an image
long_description: This project allows you to train a YOLO-based model to identify people, trains, cars, busses, bicycles, motorbikes in an image/video. This project aims to achieve precise predictions of road users, which is critical for applications in autonomous driving and advanced driver-assistance systems.
